modName: A Redguard based on Balthazar from Scorpion King Movie
summary: Based on Michael Clarke Duncan in Scorpion King, well so so, if only somebody could add the scars.
descriptionHtml: Hi. You start at Helgen Keep, level 1, with Ralof, after killing those two first imperials to recover the key (it\'s the earlier save I have). You can level up to level 2 right away. I guest you could make changes with  \"showracemenu\" code if you want. I just wanted to share my character, later in game he looks great with the hide armor :). Feel Free to make him better. I hope somebody could add the scars and the earring, and in the future turn him in a cm companion or something like that. Well, I hope you like him.
author: hinatafan
